attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i worked on a vehicle restoring it for two years, i live in the country the test ran out and as i was working on it to get it tested, the road tax ran out,there is no off road parking where i live, apart from the grass area in front where my van was parked on ramps whilst carrying out the welding that it had failed the test on, whilst at work the dvla took my van and crushed it,coased me alot of heart ache and hard work let alone the money i had spent restoring my pride and joy,Had i been deliberatley evading tax then it would have been a different matter,And to top it off i had to pay back tax for a vehicle that had no test ? who is breaking the law and how many other innocent road users have been through the same or similar,I found my van twelve month later still in one piece being protected by the scrap yard owner, ready to sell it on..

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
